column2: "It's good to see you, Master! \"Silver Lining\" Lucotte, at your service."
"Wh-, \"Silver Lining\"...? What's that about?!"
"Hehe... I was mimicking Kyo's nickname. How was it, Master?"
"It's a fine nickname."
"It's, uh..."
"I'm honored to have earned your praise! How elating!"
"Oh, did you not like it? That is too bad..."
"It requires great courage to introduce yourself using a nickname... Kyo possesses an incredible amount!"
"Yeah. When we were little Kyo started using them out of nowhere!"
"\"From now on I am the 'Prime Meteor'!\""
"It took me by total surprise. Though I never did call him that!"
"How nostalgic. That must have been right before I contracted acute Photonosis."
"That's right! Speaking of surprises, I never expected you to become a Cast, Luco."
"You were gone from school for a long time, but then you came back as a Cast out of nowhere! You were so much taller, and you graduated right away!"
"That is right. Normally, the Cast conversion process occurs shortly after birth when the condition is discovered. So a late onset of Photonosis is quite rare..."
"Despite the unusualness of my situation it was deemed necessary, and I underwent the process during my school years."
"As a result, I was given this body while still a student..."
"At first I was worried that you both would be frightened of me or hate me for it..."
"There's no way we'd hate you! You were our dear Luco, and nothing was going to change that!"
"Hehe. You have always said that, haven't you Stratos."
"But back then... I had lost my original heart after becoming a Cast..."
"My love for hospitality... Even when I froze because I couldn't suppress my feelings in battle..."
"The two of you gave me the strength to be myself, and I was able to move again."
"I still cherish the flower accessory you gave me dearly, and have kept it with me always."
"That takes me back. I made it as a get well charm for you."
"Hm...? Didn't Kyo give you some kind of gift back then too...?"
"Yes! That is when Kyo gave me my nickname."
"Ohh, now I remember! You were completely dumbfounded when he announced it."
"His nickname for me then was \"Wandering White Cloud\"."
"Right, Kyo got so upset because he couldn't think up a good name! Oh, so is \"Silver Lining\"...?"
"Hehe... It was a collaborative effort between us."
"Aw man, now I kinda want a nickname too... That way we'd all be..."
"Then I shall grant you one... From this point on you will be Stratos, the \"Azure Streak\"... Carry it well."
"\"Azure Streak\"...! That's great, Kyo!"
"It is! It has a gallant tone that fits you perfectly Stratos!"
"Alright, let's give it a go then..."
"Stratos the \"Azure Streak\"!"
"Lucotte the \"Silver Lining\"!"
"Th-This is...way too embarrassing! I can't do it!"
"Really...? That is unfortunate, it seemed quite cool to me..."
